changeSet.author: nfleming
changeSet.comment: Add sample QC types for Signatera Primer Design metrics
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `prodlims`.`qc_type` (`category`, `description`, `name`, `ismultisample`) VALUES ('SAMPLE', 'The number of assay in the 16-plex pool', 'NUMBER_OF_ASSAYS_IN_POOL_METRIC', 0);
